Description: Mould-made pottery lamp with three nozzles and a plain discus. The handle-ornament is missing. The lamp stands on an undefined flat base. Brown, micaceous clay covered in orange-brown slip with traces of post-firing, pink colour. Plaster mould.
Curator's comments: When acquired the alien handle-ornament 1925.11-20.45.b was applied. 1925.11-20.45.b has been removed.
Close, but with four nozzles: Hayes, J.W., 1980. ‘Ancient lamps in the Royal Ontario Museum’. Toronto : Royal Ontario Museum, 439.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q1921)
